understanding.heading: What is Thermal Insulation?
understanding.definition: Thermal insulation is the process of applying special materials to prevent heat transfer between the inside and outside of buildings. In Makkah, where temperatures can exceed 45°C, thermal insulation becomes essential to maintain comfortable indoor temperatures and reduce air conditioning loads.
understanding.criticality: In Makkah Al-Mukarramah, thermal insulation is a necessity due to extreme summer temperatures and high humidity in some areas. Thermal insulation protects buildings from excessive heat gain, leading to significant energy savings and improved indoor comfort.
